column4: hi i managed to get as far as clicking the update button in the update manager and accepted the conditions, but then i get an error message saying it failed to fetch 6 .gz files, and that its usually a network problem, but most are 404 errors, and then it halts.
i believe the servers are having issues.  hence the 404's.  perhaps try a mirror.
well, i guess we'd have to access ubuntu.com to find a mirror, too.  sorry.  :(
it's a temporary thing. probably all good in a few days.
